titleStmt.title: Commonwealth of Kentucky v. Robert Robertson, Indictment
CWG5456

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
Floyd Circuit Court
The Commonwealth of Kentucky
against } Indictment
Robert Robertson

The Grand Jury of Floyd County in the name and by the authority of the Commonwealth of Kentucky accuse Robert Robertson of the offence of Horse Stealing Committed as follows to wit the said Robert Robertson on the 6th day of May 186 in the county and circuit aforesaid did willfully & feloniously take Steal & carry off a certain horse the personal property of Preston Sturgeon of the value of more than four Dollars against the peace and dignity of the Commonwealth of Kentucky.

J S Dury Commonwealth Attorney
A Copy Attest
John G Johns C. F. C. C
61
Commonwealth
vs } Indict Horse Stealing
Robert Robertson
A True Bill
Jas Delong foremanCommonwealth
Witnesses
James Yates
David Pucket
Hester Ann Pucket
A Copy
John G Johns
Clk
